LanguageData.IT_Dialog_Root: The mysterious person surrounded by a swarm of insects greeted {Interviewer_nameDef}, saying, "Don't worry, these children are not like wild insects. They are very obedient. My name is {Interviewee_nameDef}, and I am a insect trainer who can tame the insects. However, because of this ability, I have been wandering for a long time and I want to join you. Of course, if you don't agree, I will leave in a day."
